S:log-item.D:comment:
Derby-214 Remove System.exit from NetworkServerControlImpl
Patch contributed by David Van Couvering below are his comments I relocated the execute method from NetworkServerImpl (previously called DB2jServerImpl) to NetworkServerControl.
I modified derbynet/testconnection.java so that it checks and makes sure the exit status matches what is expected (1 for error, 0 for no error).
